events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund as it does not fit me properly and I was hoping to return it for a full money back.
The issue has been categorized as a Refund request since the customer mentioned returning the product and needing their money back.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah W. for further assistance with the refund process.
Hello, thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you want to return the jacket and get a refund, I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the return?
Sure, my order number is 789654123. The jacket is unworn and still in the original packaging. Please let me know the next steps.
Thanks for the info. You can send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly. Once we receive it, we will process your full refund promptly.
That sounds great, I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label. Looking forward to getting the refund processed soon.
We have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Please ship the jacket back at your earliest convenience to complete the refund process.
Just checking in to see if you have shipped the jacket back and if everything is progressing fine with your refund request.
Yes, I shipped the jacket yesterday and received confirmation from the courier. Thanks for the follow-up.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed successfully. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback on your refund experience. We would appreciate if you could take a moment to complete it.
I completed the survey and am very satisfied with how smoothly the refund process was handled. Thank you for your support.
Your case has been closed as resolved. Please contact us again if you need any further assistance in the future.
